name: full-stack-part3
description: Part 3 of the Full Stack MOOC course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Full-stack-course/part2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../Full-stack-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Katri Saarinen
